Chicago.Loews Hotel Tower: 455 North Park Drive or Loews Hotel Tower, also known as Loews North Park Drive, is a 49 story 546 ft (166 m) tall skyscraper located at 455 North Park Drive in Chicago, Illinois. The 52 floor building will have 86,121 m2 (927,000 sq ft) of floors space. It has 400 hotel rooms, 398 rental apartments, and assorted ballrooms, bars, restaurants and parking spaces.
